model_name.label: Model name
model_name.definition: Official name or identifier for the model

developer.label: Developer/Organization
developer.definition: Company or research group that created the model

release_date.label: Release date
release_date.definition: Date when model was first publicly announced or made available

parameters.label: Parameter count
parameters.definition: Total number of trainable parameters in the model

context_length.label: Context length
context_length.definition: Maximum number of tokens the model can process in a single input

sources.label: Sources
sources.definition: Official documentation, research papers, or announcements about this model
sources.instruction: Enter one URL per line. Press Enter on empty line when done.
